text: Harvey Weinstein ’ s attorney blasted Asia Argento for “ hypocrisy ” on Monday, following a report that she had settled a sexual abuse claim brought by actor James Bennett. Argento was one of Weinstein ’ s initial accusers, telling the New Yorker ’ s Ronan Farrow that he forcibly performed oral sex on her 20 years ago. Argento has also been at the forefront of the movement to hold Hollywood ’ s sexual abusers to account.
